recipesJson.name: MlNikon's stb lime cheesecake
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description:
This is a new york cheesecake with slices of fresh strawberry and lime on top. Made for this weeks episode of Mixin Vixens: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-eObxv12Zy4&feature=youtu.be

If you want to support us in a fun and tasty way, check out our one shots at: https://flavorjungle.com/pages/search-results-page?q=mixing+vixens
